modName: Summon Riekling Spell - Requires Dragonborn DLC
summary: Have one Riekling? Want more? Well then this spell is for you!
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]Have one or no Riekling(s)? Want more? Well then this spell is for you!

This spell lets you summon a Riekling that will last for 60 seconds, or summon a Riekling Thrall which will last until it dies!

You can find the spell tomes to summon them in [color=gold]Dragonsreach on Farengar's desk.[/color] (Location in one of the pictures)

This file contains no scripts and the Riekling also levels up with the player at a 1:1 scale. If it's too powerful, feel free to leave balance suggestions or other comments.[/size]

[color=gold][size=5]THIS REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC[/size][/color]
